name: brown dragon scale
description: A scale from a brown dragon.  It still has its magical properties and nature resistance.

name: raw brown dragon hide
description: A carefully folded raw hide harvested from a brown dragon.  It is a large enough piece that it is workable to make armor, and with enough scales you could make scale mail.

name: tanning brown dragon hide
description: A treated brown dragon hide which is undergoing the chemical processes required to become workable.  You will be able to activate it to unroll and make use of it when it is done.

use_action.msg: You carefully unfold the brown dragon hide and shake it clean.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The brown dragon hide isn't done yet.

name: brown dragon hide
description: Prepared hide from a brown dragon.  Hard, nature-resistant, and with more scales could make a suit of armor as hard as steel and half as heavy.

name.str: pair of XL brown dragonscale boots
name.str_pl: pairs of XL brown dragonscale boots

description: Massive boots made of brown dragonscale, modified to fit even the strangest of bodies.  Very protective, and surprisingly light.

name: pair of brown dragonscale boots
description: Boots made of brown dragonscale.  Very protective, and surprisingly light.

name.str: pair of XL brown dragonhide boots
name.str_pl: pairs of XL brown dragonhide boots

description: Massive boots made of brown dragonhide, modified to fit even the strangest of bodies.  Very protective, and surprisingly light.

name: pair of brown dragonhide boots
description: Boots made of brown dragonhide.  Very protective, and surprisingly light.

name: XL brown dragonscale helmet
description: A massive helmet made from brown dragonscale, held together with brown dragonhide.  It comes equipped with a full face visor and is large enough to fit even the strangest of heads.

name: brown dragonscale helmet
description: A helmet made from brown dragonscale, held together with brown dragonhide.  It comes equipped with a full face visor.

name: XL brown dragonhide helmet
description: A massive helmet made from brown dragonhide.  It protects your head well, and doesn't cover your face, but is large enough to fit even the strangest of heads.

name: brown dragonhide helmet
description: A helmet made from brown dragonhide.  It protects your head well, and doesn't cover your face.

name: XL brown dragonscale armor
description: A massive full suit of brown dragon scale mail.  It comes with all the accoutrements that cover your torso, legs, and arms; sized to fit even the strangest of bodies.

name: brown dragonscale armor
description: A full suit of brown dragon scale mail.  It comes with all the accoutrements that cover your torso, legs, and arms, with the benefit of being very light and flexible.

name: XL brown dragonhide armor
description: A massive full suit of brown dragonhide armor.  It comes with all the accoutrements that cover your torso, legs, and arms; sized to fit even the strangest of bodies.

name: brown dragonhide armor
description: A full suit of brown dragonhide armor.  It comes with all the accoutrements that cover your torso, legs, and arms, with the benefit of being very light and flexible.

name.str: pair of XL brown dragonscale gauntlets
name.str_pl: pairs of XL brown dragonscale gauntlets

description: A pair of heavy-duty gauntlets made of brown dragonscale that covers your hands, or whatever you use as hands.

name: pair of brown dragonscale gauntlets
description: A pair of heavy-duty gauntlets made of brown dragonscale that covers your hands.

name.str: pair of XL brown dragonhide gloves
name.str_pl: pairs of XL brown dragonhide gloves

description: A pair of customized, brown dragonhide gloves, modified to be easy to wear while providing maximum protection under extreme conditions.  Sized to fit even the strangest of anatomy.

name: pair of brown dragonhide gloves
description: A pair of customized, brown dragonhide gloves, modified to be easy to wear while providing maximum protection under extreme conditions.
